title: Sorted Divisors
content: The divisors of n as a sorted list: d₁ < d₂ < ... < d_τ(n).

title: Divisor Count τ(n)
content: The number of divisors of n. Central to bounds on G(n).

title: Divisor At Index
content: The i-th divisor of n (0-indexed). Used to define G(n).

title: Function G(n)
content: G(n) = Σ dᵢ/dᵢ₊₁, the sum of consecutive divisor ratios. The central object.

title: G(p) for Primes
content: G(p) = 1/p for prime p. Only one ratio: 1/p.

title: G Upper Bound
content: G(n) ≤ τ(n) - 1. Each ratio is at most 1.

title: Tao's Upper Bound
content: G(n) ≤ τ(n). Tao's simpler upper bound.

title: Tao's Lower Bound
content: G(n) ≥ τ(n/m)/m for any divisor m of n. Key structural bound.

title: Even Number Bound
content: For even n: G(n) ≥ τ(n)/4. Taking m = 2 in Tao's bound.

title: Average Tends to Infinity
content: (1/X) Σ G(n) → ∞. The average of G grows without bound.

title: Almost All G → ∞
content: G(n) → ∞ for density 1 of integers. The first question.

title: G Ratio
content: G(n)/τ(n), the normalized version of G.

title: Continuous Distribution
content: G(n)/τ(n) has a continuous distribution function. Erdős-Tenenbaum result.

title: Erdős-Tenenbaum Theorem
content: The distribution function of G(n)/τ(n) is continuous.

title: G Not Multiplicative
content: G(ab) ≠ G(a)G(b) in general. G is not a multiplicative function.

title: Asymptotic Formula
content: Σ_{n≤X} G(n) ~ c X log X for some constant c > 0.
